General.Name: iFamily Co. Ltd.
General.Description: iFamiySC Co., Ltd. operates as an interactive branding company that connects content and products online and offline in South Korea and internationally. It operates iWedding, a wedding service platform that offers IT-based wedding and family event service products, as well as online advertising agency services; rom&nd, a color specialty cosmetic brand; iColor, a personal color diagnosis and color cosmetics library application; and Hotel Cranberry, a boutique shop for high-end brand products based on the European hotel life concept. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
